description:
Although it appears at first like a small white fuzzball, Kesaran Pasaran is an extremely useful and lucky youkai to whoever encounters it. Unknown in its origin (though one legend suggests it as a gift from angels), Kesaran Pasaran is notable for bringing good luck and happiness to anyone who encounters it. More intriguingly, the amount of the small fuzzballs can quickly multiply if kept within the vicinity of face powder for a period of time: the more Kesaran Pasaran, the more good luck.
Wikipedia
name: Kesaran-Pasaran
